Class StudentIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • StudentIO

  • public class StudentIO
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class used for input and output of student objects, as well as checking and editing student information
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Tayef

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Student> read(int day,
                                                int period)
        Reads in all students who have a spare according to the day and period
        Parameters:
        day - The current school day number
        period - The current period number
        Returns:
        An arrayList of all student objects with a spare during the period

      • checkIn

        public static void checkIn(Student student)
        Writes student information and check in time to the last line of log file
        Parameters:
        student - The student being checked in

      • checkLog

        public static java.lang.String checkLog(int number)
        Searches log file for last student check in and returns check in time
        Parameters:
        number - The student number of the student being checked in the log
        Returns:
        A string of the last time the student checked in

      • getSpares

        public static boolean[] getSpares(Student student)
        Gets all the spares a student has
        Parameters:
        student - The student whose spare periods are being searched
        Returns:
        An array of booleans for where each true index corresponds to each spare period a student has

      • setPath

        public static void setPath(java.lang.String file,
                           java.lang.String path)
        Finds file path being used and replaces with a new file path
        Parameters:
        file - The file path being replaced
        path - The new file path

        Returns:

                              int period,
                              java.lang.String first,
                              java.lang.String last,
                              int num)
        Adds student to spare data files
        Parameters:
        day - Day of student's spare
        period - Period of student's spare
        first - First name of student being added
        last - Last name of student being added
        num - Student number of student
